name: Blaze In Flame World
description:
Blaze In Flame World

Date: January 1st 2020

Control

Arrow Keys To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Story/Plot

Dr. Eggman Nega Attacked Sol Island In The Panic Of His Badnik Coming Over To The Region And Wreck The Place With Chaos And Corruption.

On The Next Day 

Blaze Wake Up And Find Out What is The Chaos!

She Run Forward And Stop Dr. Eggman Nega

It Up To Blaze To Stop Dr.Eggman Nega And Save Her Region!
